comments:
Using attached InnerAnon source, place a breakpoint at line 13.
Select this in the variables view
In the detail pane, display "hasMoreElements()"

Get error dialog claiming an NPE (correct) but we are reporting the 
InvocationException in the log (I don't believe we should be logging this?)

This problem was introduced with Bug 11982. The idea was to write errors to the
log to aid debugging. In the case of evaluations, however, the stack trace
doesn't reflect the error in the user's code, which is the root cause of the
exception.

Removed evaluation exception logging from EvaluateAction.
